name: Galaxian DX
overview: Galaxian DX is an unofficial conversion of the 1979 arcade classic, Galaxian. It was developed by Nick "Arlasoft" Sherman and released on his itch.io page on October 23, 2021. Game description: Galaxian is a shoot 'em up in which the player is at the bottom of the screen, with an arrangement of aliens at the top. The player moves left and right to aim at an alien, then shoots a bullet up the screen, and the alien it hits is killed. The aliens are classed as Drones, Emissaries, Hornets and Commanders, with those higher up the screen scoring more points when destroyed. At set intervals an enemy will move down the screen towards you, escorting a bomber, which is a moment of high danger. Clear a wave and another is generated.
